thread.title: Rachel Finch loses weight after Ferrari World shame
thread.title_full: Rachel Finch loses weight after Ferrari World shame

title: Rachel Finch loses weight after Ferrari World shame
text: Mother fat-shamed into losing almost seven stone in a year after theme park staff slashed the price of her ticket because she 'wouldn't fit on the rides' Mum-of-one Rachel Finch weight 17st 2lb and was a dress size 24 Says staff at Ferrari World in Abu Dhabi offered her a reduced rate due to her size Rachel, 28, says park slashed price of her ticket as she was 'too fat for the rides' She's shed six and a half stone and dropped eight dress sizes in a year Swapped cookies for courgetti and pizza for protein-packed omelettes
